document.full_text: toyota motor co may slip to no. 3 in the automaker production rankings behind general motors and volkswagen due to japan's earthquake and nuclear crisis, which slashed local output by almost two-thirds in march alone.
document.title: japan quake jolts auto output, toyota may fall to no.3
lines_and_colors: toyota motor co may slip to no. 3 in the automaker production rankings behind general motors and volkswagen due to japan's earthquake and nuclear crisis, which slashed local output by almost two-thirds in march alone.
